definition: pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
Chinese pillow box (used to keep valuables)

sentences.english: Once your head hits the pillow you will probably sleep very fast.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你的脑袋黏上枕头，你将会很快入睡。

sentences.english: If I roll it up, my blanket can change into a pillow.
sentences.chinese: 如果我把它卷起来，我的毯子能变成一个枕头。

sentences.english: Let your kids rest on pillows designed to inspire musical dreams.
sentences.chinese: 让你的孩子们偎依在能激发音乐梦想的枕头上。
空间革命的中年粘弹性泡沫枕头。

sentences.english: Does it have a pillow topper?
sentences.chinese: 它是否有一件枕头轻便短大衣？

sentences.english: A nurse smoothed out the sheet and fluffed up the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 一位护士展平床单，抖松枕头。

sentences.english: Buckwheat Hull Pillows are good for back, side and stomach sleepers.
sentences.chinese: 荞麦壳枕头可治疗背部和腹部一边熟睡。

sentences.english: One woman adjusted Sandys pillow and stroked her hair.
sentences.chinese: 一个妇女调整了桑迪的枕头，摸着她的头发。

sentences.english: He reposed his head on the pillow.
When she woke up, she told me my fats made the best pillow ever.
sentences.chinese: 她睡醒以后说，我的肚腩当枕头真是绝了。

sentences.english: Then, reaching under his pillow, he pulled out some more crumpled up bills.
sentences.chinese: 然后，他伸手到枕头下摸出几张皱皱巴巴的钞票。

sentences.english: May I have a pillow, please?
Don't sit on pillows meant as headrests, as it is a variant on this taboo.
sentences.chinese: 不要坐在枕头上，因为它们是头部休息的地方。

sentences.english: It is a cowardly pride which would choose a downy pillow and a silken couch for a soldier of the cross.
sentences.chinese: 胆怯的骄傲为十字架的兵士选择羽毛枕头和丝缎卧榻。

sentences.english: The actors reproduced the running horses by pounding pillows.
sentences.chinese: 演员们捶打枕头模拟奔马的声音。

sentences.english: The boldly striped Ikea pillows pick up on the geometry of the windows.
sentences.chinese: 还有这些粗线宜家牌枕头，让窗子的几何感更好了。

definition: pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)
bare pillow (i.e. the pillow without pillow-case)
summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
